CommandDefinition.Name: deployfilter
CommandDefinition.Description: Instantiate the filter with the given name and attach to specified trigger.

Argument.Name: filterName
Argument.Description: The name of the filter of which a new instance is supposed to be created

Argument.Name: filterInstanceName
Argument.Description: The name of the new filter instance

Argument.Name: triggerInstanceName
Argument.Description: The trigger instance that the filter instance is attached to

Argument.Name: configurationParameter
Argument.Description: The configuration parameters for the filter as shown by '-configurationParameter help' or 'listfilters -v'

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version of the application.

BoolOption.Name: o
BoolOption.Description: The trigger thread is allowed to run even if this filter instance is in error state.

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Print verbose output of the state after the operation has finished.
